animeDescription: Kona is a boy who has a friend: a pink dragon named Serendipity with a kind nature. They want to stop the evil captain who tries steal gold from their peaceful island.
animeStaff: [['Terada Kenji', ['Script']], ['Matsuyama Yuushi', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Gotou Takayuki', ['Key Animation']], ['Yonekawa Koushin', ['Key Animation']]]
